method: Heat the oil in a small frying pan and gently cook the onion until soft. Add the wine and reduce by half. Stir in the crème fraîche and the peppercorns. Season with salt and plenty of freshly ground black pepper.
ingredients: 2.5ml/½tbsp vegetable oil,  1 small onion, peeled and finely chopped,  150ml/5fl oz dry white wine,  150ml/5fl oz crème fraîche or double cream,  2 tbsp green peppercorns, rinsed ,  salt and freshly ground black pepper to season
